data.event: It was opened in 1880 by a group of settlers from Pasir Tumboh, Kota Bharu led by Senik Awang Kecik.
Around 1949, Machang was delineated as a minor Territory of Kelantan.

event.title: was upgraded as a full Territory on January 1, 1952

data.event: Owing to its rapid pace of development and active economic sector, Machang was upgraded as a full Territory on January 1, 1952.
